trans-unit.source: Specifies the reason that a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed.
Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because an application was launched.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 응용 프로그램이 시작 되었기 때문에 컨트롤을 닫았습니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because another application has received the focus.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 다른 응용 프로그램에서 포커스를 받았습니다 때문에 컨트롤을 닫았습니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close*> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 때문에 컨트롤을 닫았습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close*>메서드를 호출 했습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close*>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because one of its items was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 클릭 한 항목 중 하나 때문에 컨트롤을 닫았습니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because of keyboard activity, such as the ESC key being pressed.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> ESC 키를 누르는 등의 키보드 작업으로 인해 컨트롤 닫혔습니다.
